item.title: How to add objects
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

how to place an object by click on of these buttons (see pic) :

Guess I need this code :
case :
c.addSkillXP(100, 1);
c.makeGlobalObject(coordX, coordY, objectID, int type);
break;

well my global-objects.cfg do only have 1 item ;p.
